text: (Napiye! Cilar irukkinranar;) avarkal oru viyaparattaiyo, allatu vetikkaiyaiyo kantal, (piracankam nikalttukinra) um'mai ninra vannamaka vittuvittu atanalavil cenru vitukinranar. (Akave, napiye! Avarkalai nokki,) nir kuruviraka: ‘‘Allahvitattil ullatu, inta viyaparattaiyum vetikkaiyaiyumvita mika melanatakum, melum, unavu alippavarkalilum allahtan mika melanavan
